body:
No worries I'll use the mailing list next time.

I've removed gopath value and set it in the PATH variable instead.

I used go1.5.1.windows-386.msi on the download page. 

The program doesn't print to screen. It just hangs and does nothing. I close the command prompt.

set GOARCH=386
set GOBIN=
set GOEXE=.exe
set GOHOSTARCH=386
set GOHOSTOS=windows
set GOOS=windows
set GOPATH=
set GORACE=
set GOROOT=C:\Go
set GOTOOLDIR=C:\Go\pkg\tool\windows_386
set GO15VENDOREXPERIMENT=
set CC=gcc
set GOGCCFLAGS=-m32 -mthreads -fmessage-length=0
set CXX=g++
set CGO_ENABLED=1
